response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, given its worth of $1,000,000 to you. We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $950,000. We understand the importance of making a decision that aligns with your financial situation and values, so please consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, feel free to reach out to us. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
